summary: Nick Frost presents a special spoof edition of his documentary "Danger! 50,000 Volts!" purely on the subject of the living dead.
cast: Tony Bowden|Nick Frost|Simon Pegg|Peter Rnic|Kara Solez|Kerry Solez
keywords: low budget short|spoof|based on documentary|shot in the head|scene during end credits
title: Danger! 50,000 Zombies!
